thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Dreams FC sign former Kotoko defender Smallboy Korbah
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Dreams FC sign former Kotoko defender Smallboy Korbah

title: EXCLUSIVE: Dreams FC sign former Kotoko defender Smallboy Korbah
text:
18:55 CET EXCLUSIVE: Dreams FC sign former Kotoko defender Smallboy Korbah - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Promoted Ghana Premier League Dreams FC have fortified their ranks with the signing of defender Smallboy Korbah, AfricanFootball.com has exclusively reported. 
The centre-back was available on a free transfer after he was released by Asante Kotoko at the end of the season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
